name: Alphabet Soup
author: MRSMCEVERS
summary: A quick and easy vegetable soup made with ground round and spicy vegetable juice cocktail. My kids love it!
ingredients: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle spicy vegetable juice cocktail
directions: Place the meat in a large stock pot, and cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown
Drain the meat, except for about  2 tablespoons of the juices
Dissolve the bouillon cubes in 3 cups of hot water, and add to the stock pot with the meat
Stir in spicy vegetable juice cocktail, mixed vegetables, alphabet pasta, and 6 cups of water
Simmer 20 minutes, or until pasta is tender
Season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve
